message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its benefits to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm trying to stay within a budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  How about we meet halfway at $115? I'm confident you'll find this product is worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $105?
